articles.author: Takashi Mochizuki, Debby Wu, Yui Hasebe
articles.title: TSMC Plans Major Upgrade of Japan Chip Plant in Win for Takaichi - Bloomberg
articles.description: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. plans to make advanced 3-nanometer chips in Japan, stepping up its semiconductor manufacturing roadmap in the country in a triumph for Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s technology ambitions.

articles.title: Russian-state hackers exploit Office vulnerability to infect computers - Ars Technica
